question: How Soon are Orders Mailed?
answer: We usually get our orders out within 3-4 business days.

question: I love my order! What can I do to tell my friends about it?
answer: Thank you for your feedback! Just direct them to our app!

question: May I be notified when new designs are in the shop?
answer: Yes! Signup to be notified and we will send a note to your Inbox when new items are in!
